ygData.subject: Re: Class Poll
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a Ranger, and I started really having the most fun around level 2, but the peak so far has been 39 for me, because I can do so much more and help so
ygData.messageBody:
I have a Ranger, and I started really having the most fun around level
2, but the peak so far has been 39 for me, because I can do so much more
and help so many more people. I have very good spells and very good
armor / weapons, and can help so many people that I have a ton more
fun. Also, I think that a guild is a huge part of the game and without
a GOOD one, many will drop out of the game around level 25 to 30...

Plexar Arkturis, 40th level Ranger of Bertoxxulous, Guardian of Tunare

Blizzard wrote:

> Which class do you all think peaks the latest in the game in fun and
> power? I'm just interested to know what you think. Thanks for your
> time.
